website_summaries.verdict: The FZ60 offers a lengthy optical zoom in a well-featured package, but image purists won't be satisfied with just JPEG capture and a steep price.
pros: Good-quality sound from the built-in microphone
cons: No automatic detector to switch between EVF and screen
Has the tendency to overexpose photos and video

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use is excellent, quite intuitive if you have any prior experience with digital camera menus. It fits my hands very well and the size makes the camera very convenient to carry. Optical quality is what one would expect from Leitz optics. The automatic functions seem to work very well, but I've been a photographer for going on 50 years, so I have my own way of shooting and set the camera accordingly. So far, the only thing I'd add is a variable output control for the flash. The camera may have that function and I just haven't found it yet. If anything changes, I'll let you know, but overall, I am more than pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer G

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice for an older model
customer_reviews.text: I know next to nothing about cameras and only really wanted a couple things from a camera. I wanted something with a DSLR body (otherwise I was gonna drop it) and something that could record in 1080i, and was rechargeable. This does that, and thus I am extremely pleased. I've been using it for a couple months and a full battery charge lasts me a good while if I'm not leaving it on all day. The HD video format is extremely large, so be aware that uploading them is going to eat up a lot of space on your computer. All in all, it's really good for a hobby camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moore

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I have owned earlier Lumix models. This is the easily the best. The new panorama feature is very cool.. it does it all...you just pan across scene. The zoom is clear, even past 24 optical...to what, 50? Sharpest pix i have ever taken. Even at {option 1} on the Mac one can see good definition. Color is as true as I can compare with the real thing. Everything: intensity, tint, whatever, is spot on. Just a sweet camera. Software is logical and easy to navi. More options than I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well done Panasonic!!
customer_reviews.text: Consumer report said this camera and an Olympis were the better of this style units--we have had very good success with other Panasonic items, plus I thought the envelope word serve better with my larger hands, The unit performs very well for the type of use we expected, that of high school sports, indoor and outdoor swimming--shutter speed very good and photo clarity excellent. Battery will last for about 450 photos with little flash use. We always buy extra batteries for any of our items. Zoom feature is unbelievable, it will bring objects from very far away to filling the view screen. It also has the a view finder that can be turned on for detailed long shots! Great camera
customer_reviews.author: Gene E. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: I am totally pleased with this great camera! I read all reviews until I committed to this purchase . It takes excellent photos and movies and is relatively easy to learn It doesn't have a touch screen but I don't care due to so many options which I think are easier to use than some touch screen! Super zoom! That is what I was looking for too and a great lens too! It was delivered quickly and I bought the kit with charger and extra battery ! So far I would buy another , highly recommend it for the zoom too!
customer_reviews.author: ROX THE HOUSE

customer_reviews.title: excellent feature set and ease-of-use
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding camera, especially at this price point. The 600mm-equivalent zoom lens provides unusual capability for a compact camera. The automatic mode quickly sets the various parameters depending on the subject; it even detects and sets up macro shots automatically. Flash is strong for a built-in unit. Manual controls are logically laid out. The high-definition video format does require using the Windows-only PhotofunStudio software (included with the camera) to transfer to video sequences to a DVD; a Mac version would be a welcome addition.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaNine

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Overall
customer_reviews.text: I've been quite pleased with Panasonic cameras. It's not as easy to use as my Lumix ZS6, but the photos are turning out just as nice. Of course, the zoom is awesome. The icons and buttons take some getting used to, and it's a little too easy to press the burst or video button instead of the snapshot button. I wish it came with a lens hood to cut down on sunlight glare. Plenty of features to explore and learn with. Overall, a good purchase and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm a panasonic fan I have previously owned the FZ20 and find this camera superior in every respect. Takes fabulous pictures. I like the way it goes into automatic macro if you are shooting close-ups of flowers etc. Have done a few portraits with it and people are really impressed. I also have a TZ5 which is a handy travel camera, but the FZ60 is light enough that it's going on all my trips. I also bought the Hoya 52mm super Pro 1 UV filter to protect the lens, and a flex armor camera sleeve to protect it in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: oldbackpack

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, wish the 10fps wasn't just hype.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say I really like this camera. I have a FZ28 and bought this as an upgrade. I like the higher resolution, the faster autofocus, and the low light handling. However, the loss of the longer than 4 second exposures and the lack of a true high frame rate sequential shot is disappointing. The 10fps is good, but only for three shots. Even the 5fps rate can't be sustained for more than a second! Had I know that I might not have purchased. I don't know why the high-speed data transfer evidently available for higher end cameras like the Nikon 7D can't be ported to this camera, but if it could it make this camera amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick A. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures are the Norm
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the pictures I can get with the camera. It has so many useful and fun settings. I bought this camera to replace a GE similar camera. It also took great pictures, but there was such a shutter lag missed shots were the norm along with a huge amount of frustration. I only had that camera a year before researching and finding this one. Worth every dime I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this camera. The value, features and functionality of the camera is so worth the amazing price, compared to others. My husband has been a photographers for over 20 years, and have all the high end 4-digit cost camera bodies and lenses and he even likes this one for a small compact on-the-go camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Great photos and fast shooting too!
customer_reviews.text: Grab shots never been easier for this photographer. Point and fire! No problem. I have been using this more than my Panasonic G1 and G2 with many lenses. The G makes better pictures, but the convience of the long zoom trumps my lens collection for most shooting. Of course my 20mm f1.7 gets used a lot especially around ChristmasTime! Get this instead of the FZ150 or FZ200
customer_reviews.author: machinehead

customer_reviews.title: Great Images and a Big Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: We have been loyal Panasonic Lumix fans for years since our Sony and Canon digital cameras suddenly stopped working during our travels abroad where heat and humidity are challenges to electronics. This is the second Panasonic Lumix camera that we own. It's images are sharp and the colors are accurate and vivid. The feature we like most is the extreme zoom capabilities not found in many cameras of this price range. This camera gives us the same joy experienced when using our Nikon 35mm SLR's, but with the enhanced benefits of a digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a Nikon P80, which was a nice camera for it's time. I'd have bought the fz200, but it's a little steep for my pocketbook. I don't think you can beat the fz60 on price/performance (I see the price is down from what I paid). I use it a lot for nature shots, birds, squirrels and anything else that wanders into our yard. I'm very pleased with the results. I'm a photoshop addict, so it's nice to have all those pixels to play with. I also own a Lumix lx7 that I like for snapshots of family gatherings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Collins

customer_reviews.title: After shaky start. It's a Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has not been with us 24 hours. Our hope is that in the next week we will locate some instructions online. Follow-up a week later: After giving up on finding a "Quick Start" or a simple how to instruction, a complete user manual was located on the web. I just put the camera on "auto" and the photos come out great.
customer_reviews.author: Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great. Feature laden. Would have given it five stars if the camera's warranty would be honored in the United States. The warranty that came with my camera is only good for Latin and South America! Gray market item. Just keep in mind that if something happens to this camera; Panasonic won't honor your warranty or service it.
customer_reviews.author: jack j. seng

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: the best camera that I've had since my 2003 fuji!! simple, yet outstanding options AND easy to use.. the best ! I cannot say enough good things about this camera ! I recommend this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only cameras I ever bought before were the pocket point-and-shoot kind. This camera is leaps and bounds ahead of the best pocket camera. It takes sharp pictures even with the zoom fully extended. Night shots are also quite clear. I am having a lot of fun with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Li

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace another Lumix camera that failed due to a blurry lens problem. It is feature rich and can accommodate most photo opportunities. A little bulky but no to bad. I guess I got lucky and caught it on sale as the price is now higher, and that makes me even more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: WCW1

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-FZ60K Review
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this camera to the person that is a step away from buying a SLR camera. It has way more options that I will ever use, but is easy to operate while still allowing enough capability to fine tune settings. We have had a number of point and shoot cameras and this one seems to blow away the others.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is going to be a great travel camera. This is not the latest model so it doesn't have wifi which is a slight disadvantage, but it takes so much better pictures than a point and shoot, with so much less effort and weight than an SLR, that I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: briegull

customer_reviews.title: Best balance out there!
customer_reviews.text: If you are fun of photography but don't want to invest in an SLR camera, this is the best option I would recommend. I was delighted to discover that this version is made in Japan, NOT in China. No need to be a professional to be able to shoot some great pics with it. The zoom is awesome and do not require much of stability, so no need for a tripod. I just love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Could Ask For
customer_reviews.text: I am well satisfied with this camera. It has plenty of advanced features but the nice thing about it is you can set it on automatic and it does all the thinking for you.. It takes beautiful pictures too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: This is my all time favorite digital camera I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite digital camera I have owned! Lightweight, easy to carry, and the lens is fantastic! With this camera and my 2 previous Lumix cameras, I have taken over 1.1 million photos without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from South Haven

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera with a viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera with a view finder that was easy to use. Ratings and reviews were good. So far I like the camera especially the view find feature. Still learning how to use the camera. More later.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second one of these in four months after crushing my first. I still don't use half the features but fabulous pics. A rare view finder. Great zoom. Considered spending about 3times as much but so glad I didn't. Unles you really want to take professional pics no need to spend more than this. I bought this one after reading consumer reports. This Was the top rated in its class.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Sease

customer_reviews.title: Real nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got to use this a whole lot yet. I was fortunate to buy when Amazon had this on sale for $229.00. I feel that is an excellent price for all the features this camera has. I compared to the Canon SX50 and Nilkon P500 and for the price this seemed to be the best way to go. I was currently using a 6MP older lumix so this FZ60 is quite a bit nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bridge camera for a novice fotographer
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a camera that would take good pictures of our son who's 18 months. None of us are great photographers, or really into photography, so we wanted something that was easy to use. Well, we found it. This does just the job, has plenty of settings for us, and was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Tonje Haugen

customer_reviews.title: no brainer point and shoot with a big zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a no brainer point and shoot camera with a big zoom lens for taking pictures of the kids from a distance (soccer games, concerts, etc). That's exactly what this is.
customer_reviews.author: M.Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for some time now, and I love it! Easy to use, lightweight, and super optical zoom. I have had many Panasonic Lumix models and loved them all. I will stay with this one for a long time I know.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DCM-FZ60K
customer_reviews.text: Great camera well worth the money. Takes beautiful pictures and is easy the use. This camera has all the bells and whistles that a person would want on a camera.
customer_reviews.author: richard harmon

customer_reviews.title: Stop using your iphone and use a real camera!
customer_reviews.text: We thought it was about time that we stopped using our iphone as the default camera. This camera is light and easy to use. The photos are great - we've been very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Abroad

customer_reviews.title: Best Lumix I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I own two earlier models of the Lumix. Both are point and shoot, but my wife and kids now use them. I upgraded to this Lumix model, and I am extremely pleased. Great starter camera for an amatuer/novice photographer who wants to start taking more technical photos.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Pundit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this camera. Fantastic package of features at a very reasonable price. Thank you to those of you who took to time to write detailed reviews on this camera. I am so very please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera with Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer, but need quality photos for my work as well as my dog rescue. This camera was recommended to me by two people that take professional photos saying it could do everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: best camaera
customer_reviews.text: i have had many different comeras over the years. the last two have been Lumix. it is easy to use. autofocus works at all zoom levels with absolutely beautiful pictures. i love it
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!!! Exceeded my expectation with great color shots. Zoom reaches out to whatever I can see and brings it back. Easy to use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: Since I received the item I started to take pictures those days and I am really happy to do that. The item is a very good make and has very good lens: LEICA.
customer_reviews.author: OLAFO Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My pictures have been amazing since the first one I took. It has a ton of features that have been fun experimenting with. It is a nice step up from your typical point and shoot. This is my third Panasonic and all I can say is I will never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. Many cameras with less features cost a lot more and don't perform as well. I'm still learning how to use but have been quite pleased this far.
customer_reviews.author: "ronmar"

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes the best pics I have ever seen from a person like me behind the view finder... Also, dont let the salesmen fool you, megapixels do make a difference. They may not be the only factor in picture quality, but they are a Big part of it. Either way, this camera rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Allen

customer_reviews.title: Poor contrast outside.
customer_reviews.text: This gave very low contrast pictures on African safari. I used the lens shade. Sharp pictures inside with flash however.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. As advertised. Light weight and easy to use. Focus is great and also easy to use by anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Kodak Easy Share 10x zoom camera. This one was very similar-just faster, lighter and with a stabilizer control. The pictures are crystal clear and so far it hasn't taken a bad picture. I have only used it on the automatic setting, but plan to learn how to use the manual settings experimentally for photos.
customer_reviews.author: R.Lotus Russell

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: I had the old one that came out in 2005. It only had 6mp. This one has 16.1 and is an amazing improvement. I am in love with this camera. It takes wonderful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Personal opinion about the camera LUMIX FZ60
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I recommend the camera LUMIX FZ60 because it has almost all the functions and tools of a professional camera. For beginners it is easy to use. Also, it has a powerful zoom (24x) that takes clear photos and creative effects.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Good for a starter! (Like me!)
customer_reviews.text: I am 16 and working to start a YouTube channel up, and this is pretty good for a starting camera! It takes REALLY nice pictures and works amazingly! The only cons would be: - I can't attach an external microphone. (Or I haven't figured out how yet.) - It is difficult to connect it to an external monitor. You will need a Mini-HDMI-to-HDMI cord. - I don't think I can attach any new lenses. (Or, again, I haven't figured out how yet.) Other than that, it is awesome! Can't wait to start filming with my friends!
customer_reviews.author: DrewPrater7

customer_reviews.title: Sonenjoys
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this camera, it takes great photos, movie clips with a fast refresh rate for sports photos
customer_reviews.author: LAWK

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best small "point and shoot" camera I've ever owned. The quality of the pictures, even at 25 zoom, is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best camera we've ever owned and best pictures
customer_reviews.text: Best camera we've ever owned and best pictures. For a high quality camera, its reasonably simple to operate, battery lasts for a couple of days of 100+/- shots per day shooting. It's light weight and compact for easy travel. The zoom and stabilization is like no other camera I've ever had. And the price is easy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Well...it's my first point and shoot and I'm really impressed with it. Excellent shots, and I've found it perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Seinejane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but I have found it difficult to read the instructions. I have trouble formating the disks and getting rid of the images stored in the camera. Instructions are confusing. I could use help
customer_reviews.author: Jack S. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera w/ just enough ZOOM
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new camera, this is an upgrade for me from the standard pocket size point and shoots. Teaching myself photography and thought this would be a great upgrade camera to learn on. Great buy, beautiful pictures. Just enough ZOOM.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great photos but the zoom trigger is giving up after a year.
customer_reviews.text: The camera has been great taking wonderful pictures and easy to use. A year or so after buying it, the zoom trigger is starting to stick. Don't know what to do with it now. Have always kept it clean and out of the heat and cold though with really very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. LaVine

customer_reviews.title: What? No lens hood?
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Takes great photos! The manual is one that covers the FZ100 as well, making life a little annoying. But the big surprise is that no lens hood is included. Not only is there no lens hood, but they don't even make one for this model! Don't order one from DeBroth on Amazon. It has an adapter that is so long it looks like you're taking pictures through a toilet paper roll. It cuts off the view of the corners of your shot when using the viewfinder. I hate using the screen to compose and shoot pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for what I wanted it for.....
customer_reviews.text: Planning to take a vacation in Alaska this summer and wanted a camera I felt could do the job, for not big bucks. Found this camera and after reading all the great reviews got one. Have been please so far and plan to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: First camera
customer_reviews.text: Took to Africa, took great pictures. A bit long on focus but once focused was excellent. Good when you don't want to change lens. Very lighweight. WiFi would have been nice but I used the camera conversion kit for ipad and it was pretty easy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I've ever owned. Takes phenomenal pictures with the greatest of ease. I can't remember what negatives might have been in other reviews, but this camera was well worth the price at time of purchase and is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: mark osborne

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a casual photographer. But this camera does everything I could ask of it and more. I love the extra features that you get when you move above a point and shoot
customer_reviews.author: matthew d mooney

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera so far! I have only had this a few days but so far I love all the features. Have a lot to read and study with this, but I am not at all disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mjartan

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and hardly ever a blurry one. Settings are easy to understand and to change. Battery lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I had a Lumix previously and this is a replacement because it quit working after it got wet. This camera has no shutter lag. I get great pictures of my grandson smiling now instead of the back of his head. The minor criticism I have is the size description. They say it is 2.9 x 2.7 x 2.7 and it is so so wrong. It is much closer to 5 x 4 x 4.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints whatsoever with my nerw camera......Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thias camera does everything I could ask for in a camera and more! Nice clear pictures even from a long distance! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Zeimet

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60
customer_reviews.text: We just started using the camera and so far has meet all of our expectations. We looked at the Nikon and Cannon and chose the Panasonic. Camera arrived on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: Is my first Brigde camera!, and this is amazing, the zoom, the functionalities every is perfect, the size is excellent and the battery
customer_reviews.author: Andres Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: Is , Easy, practical, have many utils options and picture have a high quality. Excelent sound. Recommended camera panasonic lumix.
customer_reviews.author: ana loyo

customer_reviews.title: Good solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the cost of the memory card---woozers! Make sure you look (and buy) at the same time, or you will discover, like I that they are not that easy to find locally.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and very good value -- super pictures and very easy to use -- will use it often for all my photos
customer_reviews.author: M. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with the photo quality and operation of this camera. The capabilities are very nice IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mastin DBA

customer_reviews.title: Fantasctic Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a fantastic camera, since I started using the photos I got were very clear and without tripod, heartily recommend this camera, excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: almost as good as an SLR
customer_reviews.text: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60 is a great camera. It is easy to use, and it's pictures are clear and can stops action.
customer_reviews.author: bigL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Aftrer a lot of reserach I foun this camera and it is the best price/quality ratio that I foun, I am completely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RodC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: The constant aperture on this camera with the 600mm zoom gave me the ability to capture closeup wildlife shots in Alaska that I never thought possible on my budget for a camera. Absolutely fantastic camera. The only negative is the full manual is on a disc and to print it out is over 200 pages. However, I read the basics of what I wanted to do before my trip and was able to do all the things I was looking to do without having the manual with me. People on the trip with their expensive and heavy cameras with the long lenses were astonished at the photos I captured. Thank you Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a DMC-FZ4 to this, WOW! Great camera! Keep up the good work Panasonic! Very easy to use, great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: D. Weisner

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR OUR NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAMERA WAS RECOMMENDED TO US. WE ARE NOT VERY EXPERIENCED PHOTOGRAPHERS. WE ARE LEARNING, THIS CAMERA IS SIMPLE AND TAKES GREAT PHOTOS.
customer_reviews.author: J. LaRose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: A professional photographer recommended this camera. For the money it is an EXCELLENT value. Many features you expect in a higher end camera. Easy to use controls. Photo quality is excellent even at long range. VERY pleased with it. And did I mention EXCELLENT VALUE,
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves it. It takes fantastic pictures. Reasonable price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Auto mode is exceptional
customer_reviews.text: took it to greenland and left it on auto mode the whole time. My Pictures are awesome! The video is awesome also.
customer_reviews.author: Prisoner of Appalachia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Excellent quality product, easy to use, perfect size, terrific photos. Many options to change picture styles.
customer_reviews.author: Edumar Merchan

customer_reviews.title: It's what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just point and shoot. Also a lot of functions for advanced users. With optical 24X nothing it’s far. Just great!
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Panasonic DMC -FZ 20 for several years and love it so it was natural to look at Panasonic for a present for my wife. The camera does a great job. My wife uses it most of the time in iA mode but has options to go manual as desired. The view finder is handy and not found on most cameras in the price range. The bottom line is great pictures, ease of use and right price.
customer_reviews.author: Lowcountry

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60K 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 24x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60K 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 24x Optical Zoom for the Holidays and I love it . The 3" viewing screen is just what I needed to be able to see and focus easily. The timer and multiple shot feature helped me to take large family photos with ease. Taking short movies of the grandchildren was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Yhost

customer_reviews.title: great lens!
customer_reviews.text: i was a bit disapointed because it didnt come with any memory card so i couldnt start to use it inmediatly!
customer_reviews.author: Vasoldar

customer_reviews.title: So far...so good
customer_reviews.text: so far, it has been about what i expected. Pretty good pictures from 6 to 8 feet with or without flash. I have only used the automatic setting since that is what I want. I have been pleased with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is incredible. The camera is a little more bulky than the Nikon 1 or others, but still fits comfortably in one hand
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Yacukowicz

customer_reviews.title: I swear my old FZ28 took crisper pictures
customer_reviews.text: OK, great features here, long lens, HD movies, high MP, decent aperture, just not great pictures. The red eye flash delay is horrible for children. It pre-flashes to reduce the possibility of red eye and then flashes when it takes the picture. By then everyone has looked away... It wasn't for us.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Good none-focus camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for several years now, still one of the best cameras I have used. Takes great pictures in most all lighting.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Lumix is a great quality camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this camera. It is not too big & bulky and it takes GREAT pictures. I would recommend it to all... This is my second "Lumix" camera ~ my other one was just the smaller point and shoot. Panasonic has made a terrific product with these camera's.
customer_reviews.author: Lori PA

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for me ..I mean her.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife as b-day gift. She loves it but ironically I use it more then her. Happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: 05on20s

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't ready to write this until now
customer_reviews.text: Really, I shouldn't write the review even now, because I still haven't had time to learn more than a handful of this camera's tricks, but I took it to two race tracks last weekend, and the camera performed spectacularly (until it got really dark, when it just doesn't let in enough light). The pix were as good as nearly anything I've ever shot in motorsports, and that's been a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera, easy to use wonderful features and beautiful pictures. Would recommend to novice photographers. My 15 year old daughter has has a blast using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Gliori

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received Different camera that I bough t and I Lost money
customer_reviews.author: bacilio

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60K 16.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for our daughter who has 4 very active kids. She has been using it for various athletic and social events and has been very happy with the photos it takes.The zoom lens is great for hockey and soccer games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the purchase happy! corresponds to all as it was written! Shipping Fast, and courteous service! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: IGOR

customer_reviews.title: great zoom!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great lens,an all around camera at a great price!Easy zoom to use and you can use the viewfinder instead of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is my 'throw away' camera. It works well enough for my purpose (casual snap-shots).
customer_reviews.author: English_Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Camera size
customer_reviews.text: The camera was a lot larger then I really wanted, its going to be a big change from going from the FZ 28 which I really thought was the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: fz60
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of still pics I get. I spend a lot of time in the backcountry photographing wildlife and I wanted another all purpose, lightweight camera. I would have given this camera a 5 star rating, however there is a lot of unwanted noise in videos but have learned this is common among all brands of cameras in this mega zoom category. I have wore this camera out from shooting so many pics so I bought another panasonis fz70.
customer_reviews.author: trigger

customer_reviews.title: From what I've seen so far, I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got around to testing it's full functionality but from what I've seen so far, I'm impressed. Another month will help me come up with a definite decision.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Nitty

customer_reviews.title: One Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Again I am asked to expound on this subject...for me it worked great but I mistakenly ordered two and have to return one.
customer_reviews.author: WFH

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 24x Optical Zoom - Black
product_meta.description:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ60 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 24 x Optical Zoom - Black

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



PANASONIC LUMIX DMC-FZ60, 16.1 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 24X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.0-INCH LCD, POWERFUL ZOOM & HIGH SENSITIVITY MOS SENSOR - BLACK 

ZOOM, ZOOM, ZOOM, AND ZOOM SOME MORE WITH THE LEICA ULTRA WIDE-ANGLE 25MM LENS FOR THE FZ60K DIGITAL CAMERA
Bring your subjects up close with this powerful 24x zoom.With the dynamic 24x optical zoom you won't miss your child's expressions or your favorite athlete's split-second scoring action, or even the far-away wild animal that is on the prowl. Why? Because the F5.2 wide aperture gives you stunning images and videos produced in a softly-focused background. The advanced LEICA DC VARIO-ELMARIT lens system delivers exceptional optical performance, suppressing distortion and color bleeding on the FZ60 digital camera. A clear and sharp focus in telephoto shots renders superb resolution. Use the digital Intelligent Zoom function and virtually extend 48x bringing your subjects to your frame without moving a step while the built-in Intelligent Resolution technology preserves image quality.

MORE CREATIVE CONTROLS & PHOTO STYLES TELL YOUR PHOTOGRAPHIC STORY
Photo Style, 8 new creative controls, and 3D Imagery will elevate your photographic journey.Want a digital camera that creates expressive, telling and fun scenes? With the FZ60 compact digital camera, choose from among 8 new and 6 original creative control effects as you play with a range from Toy Effect to Star Filter and Expressive. Add an artistic touch in Photo Style to your pictures and videos with 6 customizable color types, like Vivid. And get more shooting control with the new Panorama Shot, the Intelligent Handheld Night Shot (iA Mode generates an illuminated night scene), and the White Balance Bracket function which shoots 3 consecutive photos while adjusting the white balance. You can even produce 3D Images with the LUMIX FZ60 digital camera. For advanced photographers, use the manual control mode for even greater creative license. 

SHOOT LIKE A PRO WITH THESE PROFESSIONAL-GRADE CONTROL FEATURES THAT COME WITH THE LUMIX FZ60 DIGITAL CAMERA
Go after those pictures-in-the-making with Panasonic's new 12.1MP High Sensitivity MOS Sensor and Venus Engine.A newly developed 12.1-megapixel High Sensitivity MOS sensor and high performance image processing LSI Venus Engine provide high speed response, high sensitivity recording and superb image quality to capture even the most fleeting photo opportunities. The ratio of the MOS sensor and the Intelligent Noise Reduction system in the Venus Engine adjusts photos and videos taken in sensitive areas and creates clear, crisp imagery. For low-lit situations, the FZ60 digital camera's multi-process Noise Reduction System produces dramatically clear photos and videos. Intelligent HDR (High Dynamic Range) in the iA Mode overlays several still pictures consecutively shot at different exposure levels and produces a single composite picture avoiding over or under exposure. 

TAKE A PICTURE AND RECORD IT IN FULL 1080/60P HD WITH 24X ZOOM
All-at-once: Shoot and Record in Full HD with Photo Style, Creative Video, MPEG-4, and 3D.The Motion Picture designated button, on the FZ60 digital camera, lets you record while taking photos without having to switch modes. Make videos in full HD 1,920x1,080 60p in both AVCHD Progressive (MPEG-4) and MP4 formats. The powerful 24x optical zoom, with its redesigned side lever for easier zooming access, captures highly natural expressions and fast-moving sports scenes that the naked eye may miss. Play it back in dramatic slow motion and see the difference. Creative Control and Photo Style render highly unique expressions by coordinating colors to your subject and its surroundings. The point and shoot camera's Creative Video Mode lets you adjust the shutter speed and aperture any way you like when shooting videos. 

SNAP IN UNDER A SECOND WITH THE FZ60K DIGITAL CAMERA
Never Miss a shot: With quick start-up time and Light Speed Auto Focus.Capture the moment with a quick start-up time of approx. 0.95 sec. and Light Speed Auto Focus. Get 12 fps full resolution photographs with the 12.1-megapixel MOS sensor as you take a series of shots. Snap consecutively at approx. 5.5 fps/2 fps with Auto Focus Tracking. And the newly added focus mode AF Flexible resets automatically when your subject moves. Even high-speed burst shooting is possible with the electronic shutter. In Intelligent Burst Shooting, the frame rate sets according to the subject's movement. And faster data transfer is possible as the DMC-FZ60 compact digital camera is compatible with the Ultra High Speed-I standard SDHC/SDXC Memory Card. 

ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY REDUCES GLARE AND MINIMIZES HANDSHAKING
Minimize blur and produce picture perfect photos with Nano Surface Coating technology.Panasonic's Nano Surface Coating technology minimizes light reflection within the entire zoom range (380nm-780nm) thus reducing glare and producing super clear pictures. The LUMIX FZ60 camera's powerful 24x optical zoom can be increased to the 48x equivalent with the Intelligent Zoom function, taking advantage of its Intelligent Resolution technology which brings images to life. The compact digital camera's POWER O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) minimizes blur, even when zoomed, and Active Mode effectively suppresses handshake vibrations in both still picture taking and video recording. 

A CAMERA THAT IS EASY TO USE
Let iA (Intelligent Auto) Plus do all the work for you. (View Larger)Use the turn-and-push jog dial, on the FZ60K digital camera, to change your desired settings quickly so you don't miss your moving subjects. And for those intricate close-ups of flowers and insects, the 1-cm Macro feature renders dynamic detail. The newly developed 0.2-inch EVF (Electronic Viewfinder) with a 100% field-of-vision adds high resolution to every scene. In the camera's iA (Intelligent Auto) Plus Mode, you have greater creative freedom as you slide to reach the right amount of defocus control, white balance, and brightness. With features like Shake, Motion, Face, and Scene Detection and Recognition, your images will stand out even more. For fun, add Happy Mode, optimizing your image's true colors marking memorable memories.

A LUMIX CAMERA THAT MAKES SHARING YOUR PHOTOS WITH YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA CIRCLES EASY
Make sure your images make the social circles with easy uploading to Facebook and YouTube.With the LUMIX FZ60 digital camera, upload photos and videos instantly to Facebook and videos to YouTube. Photos or videos recorded in AVCHD on the SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Cards are easy to view on a Panasonic VIERA TV. Viewing images taken in the 3D Photo Mode via the 3D VIERA TV will offer an exciting experience. And the PHOTOfunSTUDIO 8.3 AE makes it possible to sort and organize new photos and videos and those stored on your computer. You can also enjoy making slideshows using varying effects as well as your iTunes library for background music. Add a title or comments or even tag family and friends with Face Recognition.

ACCESSORIZE AWAY WITH THESE GREAT LUMIX PRODUCTS
Tele Conversion Lens DMW-LT55 (requires Lens Adaptor DMW-LA5)
Shoots at 1.7x magnification and F3.7 brightness. It is almost half the size and less heavy than the 1.5x tele conversion lens.Lens Adaptor DMW-LA5 (works with Conversion Lens DMW-LT55)
Made of high-quality aluminum, this adapter mounts onto the Tele Conversion Lens DMW-LT55 and Close-up Lens (DMW-LC55).Dynamic Close-up Lens DMW-LC55 (requires Lens Adaptor DMW-LA5)
Prevents blurring with a 2-lens feature that magnifies 3-times that of a typical telephoto setting in Macro Mode. Adjust your zooming degree.3-step ND Filter DMW-LND52
Reduces your light intensity when shooting with a fully open aperture, letting you use a slow shutter speed even in outdoor scenes. 
PANASONIC POINT AND SHOOT CAMERA COMPARISON CHART
